thongtin: Because he still loved his ex-girlfriend, the husband gave her all his money, house, and car. After his wife found out, her family became homeless.
Your husband loves to shop, but your family goes bankrupt, you become homeless
You will be jailed in jail for drug use
tomLuocText: Drug use leads to jail time.

thongtin: You will become the owner of a 5-star hotel chain
One morning, after waking up, the husband was very surprised that he had won the lottery and become wealthy.
At the age of 45, the husband will become wealthy because his wife is the daughter of a billionaire.
At the age of 50, your husband will become the president of the country and you will be spoiled for choice.
At the age of 35, the husband will be bought a car by his wife's family.
At the age of 29, your family will have to beg for a living because the husband has sold the house for gambling.
At the age of 50, your family will have to sell the house to pay for the husband's medical treatment due to his frequent alcohol consumption.
At the age of 45, you have bought a villa and a luxury car.
The house you can afford to buy at 30? It's an apartment
The car you can afford to buy at the age of 30? It's a bicycle that belongs to both of you.
After one year of dating, the wife was given a million-dollar mansion as a gift from her husband.
After giving birth to her first child, the wife was given a new Mercedes by her husband.
The old man was suddenly bought a phone by a guy
The husband was stunned when he saw his wife spend 15 million in 15 minutes
Given expensive gifts by her boyfriend, the girl was surprised to learn that he was a drug lord
The husband loved his wife and children and sold the whole house to buy gifts for his mistress.
Seeing that his wife is not as good as someone else's wife, the husband plays to spend hundreds of millions of dong to rebuild and rebuild for his wife.
The wife was distraught when suddenly a group of people came to clean up the house, it turned out that the husband had bought a bigger house and they were moving to a new house.

The couple was surprised to see that the price of the blender was reduced by 2 thirds of the amount yesterday and decided to buy it to try the strawberry smoothie, only to find out that the machine was broken.
The husband always criticizes his wife for not knowing how to dress, the wife takes 500 million to go shopping, and changing herself makes the husband cross his eyes
Surprised to see that the husband had no money to work, learned that he had used all the money to buy a house and a car for the third person.

Parents-in-law saw that the youngest couple had been married for a long time but had not yet saved enough money to buy a house of their own. When asked why, they told them to stay with their parents to save money on food.
